text: "I Need a Girl (Part One)" is a song by American rapper P. Diddy. It features Usher and Loon. It was released from the album We Invented the Remix (2002). It reached number two on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. It reached number one on the Hot Rap Tracks chart. It also reached number four on the UK Singles Chart. ==Track listings== CD-Maxi ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2002) Peak position Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 6 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2002) Position Australia (ARIA) 59 Australia Urban (ARIA) 11 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) 53 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) 36 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 43 France (SNEP) 73 Germany (Official German Charts) 47 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 4 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 26 Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) 10 UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 77 US Billboard Hot 100 15 US Hot R&B;/Hip- Hop Songs (Billboard) 20 ==References== Category:2002 songs Category:Rhythm and blues ballads Category:Rap songs Category:Usher songs Category:Sean Combs songs
